title: @Riot Developers - I called Ezreal and I Knew it. Offically Leaving Game.
body:
I knew Riot Games was going to give Ezreal the mini VGU. I called it months ago after I heard about it. You want to know why? Years ago I made a comment to Meddler saying Karma's VGU put her in an even worse spot that the majority of the Karma community is not happy with. This was several years ago and Meddler made the ridiculous comment that Ezreal needed a VGU before Karma. The majority of us were very upset with him at the time and I never forgot what he said. From that day I knew it was going to happen because they went out of their way to work on art assets for Lux last year and it was only a matter of time before Ezreal was made a top priority. 

I am not going to sit here and say Karma is more worthy of a VGU than a lot of champions right now, but I am going to say that she and many other champions needed a VGU or deserved a mini VGU before Ezreal. Ezreal has an identity in this game, he has a fully conceptualized theme, outdated but completed VO, and other things. Yes, Ezreal needs a new W and a new model. Unfortunately we have champions, like Karma, who received a horrible, rushed, and incomplete VGU 5 years ago. This Development team has used excuse after excuse to do nothing on Karma for the past 5 years. It took this Development team 5 years to work on her directionless and bland kit, to probably accomplish absolutely nothing when it does come out in a few weeks. The decision and ridiculous comments made by Developers like Reav3 and Meddler saying that a champion like Ezreal needs a prioritized mini VGU and deserves it over champions like Karma, Morde, Pantheon, Malzahar, Skarner, all the Yordles, or Shaco is ridiculous.

I have lost all respect for this Development team as content creators. I will not give a single dime to them ever again, I will not provide my love and admiration for their work ethic and game, and I will not spend the next 5 years trying to advocate work for champions like Karma, Morde, Pantheon, Malzahar and many others. I just cannot do it anymore. You say you care about all of your champions but in the end you have yet to show it. You have purposely messed up and failed the mark on a lot of these champions that the actual mains are not happy with. You have blatantly ignored so many problems and champions that need obvious work to do work on champions like Ahri, Lux, Ezreal, Jinx and other popular ones because that is what aligns with your favoritism. The argument that one champion is marketable compared to another is irrelevant. This Development team has the resources, creativity and time to put as much work as they want to in any champion to make them more marketable and popular. This Development team just keeps doing it for the same champions every year and creating content for them every single year. It's to the point that no one can no longer stand it when their champion gets ignored for 5 years and is told that a champion like Ezreal deserves a rushed mini-VGU because he is more popular and needs a new W.

Karma has no running and shield casting animation, her splash art does not match her in-game model, her original model 5 years ago was rushed and is completely different from what it was supposed to be, she has a directionless and bland identity and kit, she has no relevant or existing thematic that anyone can pinpoint, her lore is still bland but acceptable because it is vastly better than the hack-job you did before, and lastly Karma has the most pathetic VO and taunts in this game because it doesn't match up with her new lore or it already exists on a champion. Shen dance much?

I'm done. You no longer have the respect and admiration I had for you, Riot. You choosing to do a mini VGU on a champion like Ezreal is the most ridiculous and proof of favoritism I have ever seen from game Developers. When you think that champions like Karma, Morde, Pantheon, Malzahar, Skarner, all the Yordles, or Shaco doesn't deserve a mini VGU before Ezreal is very insulting and mind boggling. I'm not dealing with it anymore.

The excuse that "Karma was the very first VGU in LoL history, there are other champions that need a VGU before Karma, we just don't have the time and resources to put money and work into Karma anymore, and Karma needs a VGU." These are all things that you guys have said for the past 5 years and excuses as to why the work you did 5 years ago is acceptable to be ignored for an Ezreal VGU. No, it's favoritism. I wasn't even expecting Karma to get it. I was really hoping Shaco or another Yordle was going to get the mini VGU. Instead you give it to the one champion I knew all along was going to get it.

I said if Ezreal is getting the mini VGU I was going to be done with the game for good and I am keeping that promise. As we speak I am going to be having all 17 of my accounts locked to never play this game again. I was hopeful for the Karma rework but I cannot support this Development team knowing that is it going to be half-arsed work on her and other champions.  I am happy for the Ezreal mains that are excited about this. I am happy for the players that wanted this for the champion. I am disappointed that for the past 5 years I, and many other mains of their favorite champions, have been so active in trying to get things done on not just Karma but other champions, to in the end have another popular champion get something done on them. If you know your work ethic and choices ruined a champion, you don't ignore the problem. You sit here and rectify your mistakes and make it better. I cannot say that about a lot of things in this game. 2019 is the mini Lux VGU so just prepare for it.

(I can respect your decision to down-vote but I would appreciate if you didn't. Thanks though.)

2. They already updated his model/rigging/animations with his Pulsefire update. Yes, they can't keep all of that, but there's likely portions they can keep and unused development material they can pull on, making this less of a "from scratch" process than other champs.
3. Popularity. He's got a high chance of being one of the first champs a new player is exposed to, having him look nice goes farther in making the overall game look better.

Mordekaiser and Pantheon need reworks way more than Kayle or Morgana ever would, but the sisters are going first because Riot has a clear direction of where to take them in terms of theme, lore, gameplay, etc.
